line_1: The Satyr, as old Tales recount,
line_2: Gaz'd on Diana in the Fount,

line_1: There shall my plaintive song recount
line_2: And, faster than the dropping fount,

line_1: All which the sacred bard would oft recount:
line_2: To clear Euphrates, and the secret mount,

line_1: As well might I the sands recount,
line_2: As tell them o'er, so great th' amount.

line_1: There would I thy power recount,
